import {FaCodepen, FaStore, FaUserFriends, FaUsers} from "react-icons/fa" import {useEffect, useContext} from "react" import GithubContext from "../context/github/GithubContext" import {Link, useParams} from "react-router-dom" import Spinner from "../components/shared/Spinner" function User() { const {getUser, user, loading} = useContext(GithubContext) const params = useParams() useEffect(()=>{ getUser(params.login) }, []) const { name, type, avatar_url, location, bio, blog, twitter_username, login, html_url, followers, following, public_repos, public_gists, hireable, } = user if(loading) { return } return ( <>
Back to Search
) } export default User
